channel.title: Edge4Pk - Pk & PvM | 742 Pre EoC
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.edge4pk.com/CSS/img/banner.png[/img]
[url=http://www.edge4pk.com/webclient.php]Play now[/url] | [url=http://www.edge4pk.com/Edge4Pk.jar]Download client [Recommended][/url] | [url=http://www.edge4pk.com]Website[/url] | [url=http://www.edge4pk.com/forums/]Forums[/url]
[b]About[/b]
Edge4Pk is a server focussed around Pk & PvM. To support this we have a [u][b]spawntab[/b][/u] with a wide range of spawnable sets and itemsalong with multiple pk places, minigames, bosses and skills that have to do with combat and PvM.
The perfect server for anyone that wants to login and start Pking or PvMing [b]without[/b] hassle of training! Join us for the ultimate experience on a [b]pre-Eoc[/b] server.
[b]Staff team[/b]
Owners: Blaze & Lestic
Administrator: Zezima Administrator: Empty
Moderator: Caps Moderator: Jayden Moderator: Empty
[b]Features[/b]
• Login and Pk/PvM • Spawntab with a wide array of spawns • TokkulShare (Custom CoinShare) • Lag free • Lots of bosses and minigames • Active Pk community • Activity Points for being online • Full [b]slayer[/b] and [b]summoning[/b]
... and lots of features more!
[b]Pictures[/b]
